sentences.chars: 长城是中国最著名的地方。
sentences.pinyin: Chángchéng shì Zhōngguó zuì zhùmíng de dìfang。
sentences.toneless: Changcheng shi Zhongguo zui zhuming de difang。

sentences.chars: 我们是跟一个中国导游去的。

sentences.toneless: wo faxian Changcheng shang mei you lajitong。

sentences.toneless: canguan le Changcheng yihou women qu kan le jingju。

sentences.chars: 在中国如果你在一个很有名的大学上学，你的亲戚会感到很骄傲。

sentences.chars: 在中国成为名牌大学的学生就等于成为家人和亲戚的骄傲。

sentences.toneless: ta bu gei wo fa duanxin。
sentences.english: He didn't send me a text message.

sentences.chars: 这个星期我们写完了所有的句子。
sentences.pinyin: zhè gè xīngqī wǒmen xiě wán le suǒyǒu de jùzi。
sentences.toneless: zhe ge xingqi women xie wan le suoyou de juzi。
sentences.english: This week we finished writing all the sentences.

sentences.chars: 从下个星期开始我可以很认真地学习。
sentences.pinyin: cóng xiàgè xīngqī kāishǐ wǒ kěyǐ hěn rènzhēn de xuéxí。
sentences.toneless: cong xiage xingqi kaishi wo keyi hen renzhen de xuexi。
sentences.english: From next week on I can start to study very seriously.

sentences.chars: 如果在中国你去商店买东西，卖东西的人有时候要你留下你的详细信息，比如你的性别，你的年龄，你的电话号码等等。
sentences.pinyin: rúguǒ zài Zhōngguó nǐ qù shāngdiàn mǎi dōngxi mài dōngxi de rén yǒushíhóu yào nǐ liúxià nǐde xiángxì xìnxī bǐrú nǐde xìngbié nǐde niánlíng nǐde diànhuà hàomǎ děngděng。
sentences.toneless: ruguo zai Zhongguo ni qu shangdian mai dongxi mai dongxi de ren youshihou yao ni liuxia nide xiangxi xinxi biru nide xingbie nide nianling nide dianhua haoma dengdeng。
sentences.english: If you buy something in a shop in China, sometimes the sales person wants you to leave some detailled personal information, for example your sex, your age, your phone number, etc.

sentences.chars: 你千万别给他们你的信息。
sentences.pinyin: nǐ qiānwànbié gěi tāmen nǐde xìnxī。
sentences.toneless: ni qianwanbie gei tamen nide xinxi。
sentences.english: Under no cicrumstances you should give them your information.

sentences.chars: 如果你给他们你的信息，他们就会给你发很多的广告。
sentences.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ gěi tāmen nǐde xìnxī tāmen jiù huì gěi nǐ fā hěn duō de guǎnggào。
sentences.toneless: ruguo ni gei tamen nide xinxi tamen jiu hui gei ni fa hen duo de guanggao。
sentences.english: If you give them your information, they will send you a lot of advertisement.

sentences.chars: 如果你想买东西，你最好直接去商店买。
sentences.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng mǎi dōngxi nǐ zuìhǎo zhíjiē qù shāngdiàn mǎi。
sentences.toneless: ruguo ni xiang mai dongxi ni zuihao zhijie qu shangdian mai。
sentences.english: If you want to buy things, you better go directly to the shop to buy them.

sentences.chars: 祝你今天过得愉快！
sentences.pinyin: zhù nǐ jīntiān guò de yúkuài！
sentences.toneless: zhu ni jintian guo de yukuai！
sentences.english: I wish you today a happy day!

sentences.chars: 你是淘气的小燕子吗？
sentences.pinyin: nǐ shì táoqì de xiǎo yànzi ma？
sentences.toneless: ni shi taoqi de xiao yanzi ma？
sentences.english: Are you a small naughty swallow?

sentences.chars: 在留学生办公室老师收到了很多学生的护照。
sentences.pinyin: zài liúxuésheng bàngōngshì lǎoshī shōu dào le hěn duō xuésheng de hùzhào。
sentences.toneless: zai liuxuesheng bangongshi laoshi shou dao le hen duo xuesheng de huzhao。
sentences.english: In the office of the exchange students, the teacher received the passports of many students.

sentences.chars: 校长让我把这些护照排列整齐。
sentences.pinyin: xiàozhǎng ràng wǒ bǎ zhè xiē hùzhào páiliè zhěngqí。
sentences.toneless: xiaozhang rang wo ba zhe xie huzhao pailie zhengqi。
sentences.english: The headmaster asked me to put in order these passports.

sentences.chars: 他让我按照学生名字的字母顺序排列。
sentences.pinyin: tā ràng wǒ ànzhào xuésheng míngzi de zìmǔ shùnxù páiliè。
sentences.toneless: ta rang wo anzhao xuesheng mingzi de zimu shunxu pailie。
sentences.english: He invited me to order it according to the letters of the students names.

sentences.chars: 他让我一定要仔细地排列。
sentences.pinyin: tā ràng wǒ yídìng yào zǐxì de páiliè。
sentences.toneless: ta rang wo yiding yao zixi de pailie。
sentences.english: He invited me to be definitely careful when putting it in order.

sentences.chars: 不要丢了任何学生的护照。
sentences.pinyin: bú yào diū le rènhé xuésheng de hùzhào。
sentences.toneless: bu yao diu le renhe xuesheng de huzhao。
sentences.english: Do not loose any of the student passports.

sentences.chars: 我跟朋友去北京烤鸭饭店吃饭。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ gēn péngyou qù Běijīng kǎoyā fàndiàn chīfàn。
sentences.toneless: wo gen pengyou qu Beijing kaoya fandian chifan。
sentences.english: I am going with a friend to a Bejing roasted duck restaurant to eat.

sentences.chars: 但是饭店里坐满了人。
sentences.pinyin: dànshì fàndiàn lǐ zuò mǎn le rén。
sentences.toneless: danshi fandian li zuo man le ren。
sentences.english: But inside the restaurant all seats are full (with people).

sentences.chars: 没有座位了。
sentences.pinyin: méi yǒu zuò wèi le。
sentences.toneless: mei you zuo wei le。
sentences.english: There is no seat (empty/available).

sentences.chars: 于是我跟朋友打算去周围走走。
sentences.pinyin: yúshì wǒ gēn péngyou dǎsuàn qù zhōuwéi zǒuzou。
sentences.toneless: yushi wo gen pengyou dasuan qu zhouwei zouzou。
sentences.english: Hence my friend and I decided to go for a walk in the surroundings.

sentences.chars: 顺便看一看周围的房子。
sentences.pinyin: shùnbiàn kàn yí kàn zhōuwéi de fángzi。
sentences.toneless: shunbian kan yi kan zhouwei de fangzi。
sentences.english: And at the same time to look a little bit at flats in the area.

sentences.chars: 我想在这儿周围租一个房子。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng zài zhèr zhōuwéi zū yí gè fángzi。
sentences.toneless: wo xiang zai zher zhouwei zu yi ge fangzi。
sentences.english: I want to rent nearby a flat.

sentences.chars: 我有一张很大的床。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ yǒu yī zhāng hěn dà de chuáng。
sentences.toneless: wo you yi zhang hen da de chuang。
sentences.english: I have a very big bed.

sentences.chars: 这张床很重，两个人抬不动。
sentences.pinyin: zhè zhāng chuáng hěn zhòng liǎng gè rén tái bú dòng。
sentences.toneless: zhe zhang chuang hen zhong liang ge ren tai bu dong。
sentences.english: This bed is so heavy, two people can't lift it (move it).

sentences.chars: 得用工具抬这张床。
sentences.pinyin: de yòng gōngjù tái zhè zhāng chuáng。
sentences.toneless: de yong gongju tai zhe zhang chuang。
sentences.english: One has to use tools to lift this bed.

sentences.chars: 但是我的朋友告诉我他的力气很大。
sentences.pinyin: dànshì wǒde péngyou gàosu wǒ tāde lìqi hěn dà。
sentences.toneless: danshi wode pengyou gaosu wo tade liqi hen da。
sentences.english: But my friend told me, that he has very high physical strength.

sentences.chars: 他可以自己一个人抬这张床。
sentences.pinyin: tā kěyǐ zìjǐ yí gè rén tái zhè zhāng chuáng。
sentences.toneless: ta keyi ziji yi ge ren tai zhe zhang chuang。
sentences.english: He can lift this bed by himself.

sentences.chars: 最后他竟然真的做到了。
sentences.pinyin: zuìhòu tā jìngrán zhēn de zuò dào le。
sentences.toneless: zuihou ta jingran zhen de zuo dao le。

sentences.chars: 他究竟怎么变得这么强壮？
sentences.pinyin: tā jiūjìng zěnme biàn de zhème qiánzhuàng？
sentences.toneless: ta jiujing zenme bian de zheme qianzhuang？

sentences.chars: 这个人很富。
sentences.pinyin: zhè gè rén hěn fù。
sentences.toneless: zhe ge ren hen fu。
sentences.english: This person is very rich.

sentences.chars: 他有很多孙子。
sentences.pinyin: tā yǒu hěn duō sūnzi。
sentences.toneless: ta you hen duo sunzi。
sentences.english: He has many grandsons.

sentences.chars: 他的孙子也很富。
sentences.pinyin: tāde sūnzi yě hěn fù。
sentences.toneless: tade sunzi ye hen fu。

sentences.toneless: tamen dou you ziji de fangzi。

sentences.chars: 他们很富，他们都不工作。

sentences.toneless: tamen hen fu tamen dou bu gongzuo。

sentences.chars: 只有一个孙子当电影演员。

sentences.toneless: zhi you yi ge sunzi dang dianying yanyuan。

sentences.chars: 他的太太在公司当高级经理。

sentences.toneless: tade taitai zai gongsi dang gaoji jingli。

sentences.chars: 父母太照顾孩子是一件普遍的事。

sentences.toneless: fumu tai zhaogu haizi shi yi jian pubian de shi。

sentences.chars: 以中国为例，中国的父母不仅照顾孩子的生活，甚至还帮他们穿衣服，喂他们吃饭。
sentences.pinyin: yǐ Zhōngguó wèilì Zhōngguó de fùmǔ bù jǐn zhàogù háizi de shēnghuó shènzhì hái bāng tāmen chuān yīfu wèi tāmen chīfàn。
sentences.toneless: yi Zhongguo weili Zhongguo de fumu bu jin zhaogu haizi de shenghuo shenzhi hai bang tamen chuan yifu wei tamen chifan。
sentences.english: China as exemple, chinese parents not only look after their children in daily life, they event help them to dress, feed them.

sentences.chars: 有一个中国学生考上了大学，但是他不会自己穿衣服，于是他的妈妈跟他一起去上大学。
sentences.pinyin: yǒu yí gè Zhōngguó xuésheng kǎoshàng le dàxué dànshì tā bú huì zìjǐ chuān yīfu yúshì tāde māma gēn tā yìqǐ qù shàng dàxué。
sentences.toneless: you yi ge Zhongguo xuesheng kaoshang le daxue danshi ta bu hui ziji chuan yifu yushi tade mama gen ta yiqi qu shang daxue。
sentences.english: There is one chinese student who passed the entrance exam at University, but he could get dressed alone, therefore his mother went with him to University.

sentences.chars: 这是一件真事儿。
sentences.pinyin: zhè shì yí jiàn zhēn shìr。
sentences.toneless: zhe shi yi jian zhen shir。
sentences.english: This is a real story.

sentences.chars: 我的女朋友去了一家鞋店。

sentences.toneless: wode nüpengyou qu le yi jia xie dian。

sentences.chars: 但是鞋店关门了。
sentences.pinyin: dànshì xié diàn guān mén le。
sentences.toneless: danshi xie dian guan men le。
sentences.english: But the shoe shop was closed.

sentences.chars: 门上写着：暂时停止营业。
sentences.pinyin: mén shàng xiě zhe zànshí tíngzhǐ yíngyè。
sentences.toneless: men shang xie zhe zanshi tingzhi yingye。
sentences.english: On the door was written that it's temporarly closed.

sentences.chars: 原来鞋店的老板结婚了，所以不工作。
sentences.pinyin: yuánlái xié diàn de lǎobǎn jiéhūn le suǒyǐ bù gōngzuò。
sentences.toneless: yuanlai xie dian de laoban jiehun le suoyi bu gongzuo。
sentences.english: Actually the boss of the shoe shop got married, therefore he didn't work.

sentences.chars: 但是我的女朋友非常需要一双鞋。

sentences.toneless: danshi wode nüpengyou feichang xuyao yi shuang xie。
sentences.english: But my girlfriend really needed a pair of shoes.

sentences.chars: 终于她找到了别的鞋店买了一双鞋。
sentences.pinyin: zhōngyú tā zhǎodào le biéde xié diàn mǎi le yī shuāng xié。
sentences.toneless: zhongyu ta zhaodao le biede xie dian mai le yi shuang xie。
sentences.english: Finally she found another shoe shop and bought a pair of shoes.

sentences.chars: 那双鞋不大不小正好。

sentences.toneless: na shuang xie bu da bu xiao zhenghao。
sentences.english: That pair of shoes is neither big nor small, just fine.

sentences.chars: 我的一个朋友最近吃饭的动作很奇怪。

sentences.toneless: wode yi ge pengyou zuijin chifan de dongzuo hen qiguai。

sentences.chars: 而且他逐渐变得更奇怪了。
sentences.pinyin: érqiě tā zhújiàn biàn de gèng qíguài le。
sentences.toneless: erqie ta zhujian bian de geng qiguai le。
sentences.english: And he also gradually changed and become even more strange.

sentences.chars: 他到底发生了什么？
sentences.pinyin: tā dàodǐ fāshēng le shénme？
sentences.toneless: ta daodi fasheng le shenme？
sentences.english: What did finally happen with him?

sentences.chars: 很多人说他不正常。
sentences.pinyin: hěn duō rén shuō tā bù zhèngcháng。
sentences.toneless: hen duo ren shuo ta bu zhengchang。
sentences.english: Many people say that he isn't normal.

sentences.chars: 但是有的人说不需要担心，看起来奇怪或者不正常的人往往是非常聪明的人。
sentences.pinyin: dànshì yǒu de rén shuō bù xūyào dānxīn kànqǐlái qíguài huòzhě bù zhèngcháng de rén wǎngwǎng shì fēicháng cōngming de rén。
sentences.toneless: danshi you de ren shuo bu xuyao danxin kanqilai qiguai huozhe bu zhengchang de ren wangwang shi feichang congming de ren。
sentences.english: But there are people who say that there's no need to worry, people who seem strange or unnormal are often very intelligent people.

sentences.chars: 这个周末咱们做什么？
sentences.pinyin: zhè gè zhōumò zánmen zuò shénme？
sentences.toneless: zhe ge zhoumo zanmen zuo shenme？
sentences.english: What do we do this weekend?

sentences.chars: 咱们可以躺在床上看电影。
sentences.pinyin: zánmen kěyǐ tǎng zài chuáng shàng kàn diànyǐng。
sentences.toneless: zanmen keyi tang zai chuang shang kan dianying。
sentences.english: We can lie down in bed and watch movies.

sentences.chars: 另外还可以在家随便弄点儿吃的东西。

sentences.toneless: lingwai hai keyi zai jia suibian nong chi de dongxi。
sentences.english: In addition we still can as we are please, prepare things to eat at home.

sentences.chars: 然后我们可以躺在床上一边吃饭一边看电影。
sentences.pinyin: ránhòu wǒmen kěyǐ tǎng zài chuáng shàng yìbiān chīfàn yìbiān kàn diànyǐng。
sentences.toneless: ranhou women keyi tang zai chuang shang yibian chifan yibian kan dianying。
sentences.english: Then we can lay down in bed and eat food and look movies at the same time.

sentences.chars: 你的意见怎么样？
sentences.pinyin: nǐde yìjiàn zěnmeyàng？
sentences.toneless: nide yijian zenmeyang？

sentences.chars: 你记得住我们学过的全部生词吗？
sentences.pinyin: nǐ jìde zhù wǒmen xué guò de quánbù shēngcí ma？
sentences.toneless: ni jide zhu women xue guo de quanbu shengci ma？
sentences.english: Do you remember all the new words we have studied?

sentences.chars: 可能我不能完全记住。
sentences.pinyin: kěnéng wǒ bù néng wánquán jìzhu。
sentences.toneless: keneng wo bu neng wanquan jizhu。
sentences.english: Maybe I can't remember all of them.

sentences.chars: 我大概能记住百分之六十的生词。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ dàgài néng jìzhu bǎi fēnzhī liù shí de shēngcí。
sentences.toneless: wo dagai neng jizhu bai fenzhi liu shi de shengci。
sentences.english: I prorably can remember 60 percent of the new words.

sentences.chars: 虽然我只能记住五分之三的生词，但是我可以真正学会这些生词。
sentences.pinyin: suīrán wǒ zhǐ néng jìzhu wǔ fēnzhī sān de shēngcí dànshì wǒ kěyǐ zhēnzhèng xué huì zhè xiē shēngcí。
sentences.toneless: suiran wo zhi neng jizhu wu fenzhi san de shengci danshi wo keyi zhenzheng xue hui zhe xie shengci。
sentences.english: Although I only can remember 3/5 of the new words, I am really able to remember these new words.

sentences.chars: 可是我的老师说，如果不能记住全部的生词，那么以前一切的努力都浪费了。
sentences.pinyin: kěshì wǒde lǎoshī shuō rúguǒ bù néng jìzhu quánbù de shēngcí nàme yǐqián yíqiè de nǔlì dōu làngfèi le。
sentences.toneless: keshi wode laoshi shuo ruguo bu neng jizhu quanbu de shengci name yiqian yiqie de nuli dou langfei le。
sentences.english: But my teacher says, if I am not able to remember all the new words, then all the efforts I spent before are wasted.

sentences.chars: 我想让我的猪学习用嘴拿东西。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng ràng wǒde zhū xuéxí yòng zuǐ ná dōngxi。
sentences.toneless: wo xiang rang wode zhu xuexi yong zui na dongxi。

sentences.chars: 我不但想让它学习这个，而且还想让它学习在超市付钱。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ búdàn xiǎng ràng tā xuéxí zhè gè érqiě hái xiǎng ràng tā xuéxí zài chāoshì fù qián。
sentences.toneless: wo budan xiang rang ta xuexi zhe ge erqie hai xiang rang ta xuexi zai chaoshi fu qian。
sentences.english: I not only want to teach it this thing, I also want to teach it to pay in the supermarket with money (cash).

sentences.chars: 这样我可以省很多时间。

sentences.toneless: zhe yang wo keyi sheng hen duo shijian。
sentences.english: That way I can save a lot of time.

sentences.chars: 我可以在家一边看杂志一边等它回家。

sentences.toneless: wo keyi zai jia yibian kan zazhi yibian deng ta hui jia。

sentences.chars: 我的好朋友要搬家。

sentences.toneless: wode hao pengyou yao ban jia。

sentences.chars: 我想请他吃饭，但是他不想出去吃。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng qǐng tā chīfàn dànshì tā bù xiǎng chūqù chī。
sentences.toneless: wo xiang qing ta chifan danshi ta bu xiang chuqu chi。
sentences.english: I want to invite him to eat food, but he doesn't want to go out to eat.

sentences.chars: 既然他不想出去吃，我就组织了一个晚会。
